product_name: Delta Cycle Pablo 2 Bike Storage Rack
long_description: This Delta Cycle Pablo 2 bike storage rack offers a low-profile, wall-mounted storage option for up to 2 bikes, plus a small shelf for accessories or tools. Vinyl-coated arms help protect bike finishes. Rack can fold down when not being used. Please note: maximum recommended load for the Delta Pablo 2 bike rack is 65 lbs.
short_description: This Delta Cycle Pablo 2 bike storage rack offers a low-profile, wall-mounted storage option for up to 2 bikes, plus a small shelf for accessories or tools.
